B1.name: Initiate...
actionEtc: If a target opposing model is in range [em]after its first action[/em], Attack.

B2.name: Searching...
actionEtc: If a target opposing model is in range [em]after its first action[/em], Attack.
If no valid targets in range, model moves towards [b]nearest uncontrolled/contested objective[/b]

B4.name: Move & Attack
actionEtc: If no valid targets in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest uncontrolled/contested objective[/b]

B5.name: Move & Attack
actionEtc: If no valid targets in range, this model moves towards the [b]nearest objective[/b] and interacts with it when able.

B6.name: Protecting...
actionSecondary: When attacked, activate a [em]reactive superpower[/em] when able.
actionEtc: If no valid targets in range, this model moves to the [b]nearest terrain[/b] for cover.

B7.name: Cautious...
actionSecondary: When attacked, activate a [em]reactive superpower[/em] when able.
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves to the [b]nearest terrain[/b] for cover.

B8.name: Acquired
actionSecondary: If a target opposing model is in range [em]after its first action[/em], Attack.
When attacked, activate a [em]reactive superpower[/em] when able.

B9.name: Error...
actionEtc: If no valid target in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] and Attacks

B10.name: Flank
actionEtc: If there are valid targets in range [em]while in cover[/em], Attack.
If no valid targets in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] retaining cover.

B11.name: Pursuit...
actionEtc: If no valid targets in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b].

B12.name: Assault!
actionEtc: If no valid targets in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] and Attacks.
If no valid targets in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest objective[/b] and interacts with it when able.

B13.name: Targeting...
actionEtc: If no valid target in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] (most wounds)

B14.name: Targeting...
actionEtc: If no valid target in range, this model moves towards [b]nearest random[/b] model.

B15.name: Pursuing...
actionEtc: If no valid target in range, model moves towards [b]nearest random[/b] model.

B16.name: Targeting...
actionEtc: If no valid target in range, model moves towards the [b]nearest objective[/b] and interacts with it when able.
